alert.note: Alert for Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 2:53PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Cochise and east central Santa Cruz Counties through 345 PM MST... At 253 PM MST, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Elgin, or 16 miles west of Sierra Vista, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and dime size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elgin, Fort Huachuca and Canelo. This includes Route 83 between mile markers 10 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
